snippet: Jordan Spieth, the No. 1 player in the world, carded a second-round nine-under-par 64 to vault into a four-stroke lead at the Hyundai Tournament of Champions in Kapalua, Hawaii, on Friday.
abstract: Jordan Speith takes second-round lead at Hyundai Tournament of Champions in Kapalua, Hawaii.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth, the No. 1 player in the world, carded a second-round nine-under-par 64 to vault into a four-stroke lead at the Hyundai Tournament of Champions in Kapalua, Hawaii, on Friday.
